sentences.en: A family doctor will be able to advise on suitable birth control.
sentences.cn: 家庭医生能够就合适的节育措施提出建议。

sentences.en: a woman of noble birth
sentences.cn: 一位出身于贵族的女子

sentences.en: Condoms are an effective method of birth control if used with care.
sentences.cn: 如果使用得当，避孕套是很有效的避孕手段。

sentences.en: Congratulations on the birth of your daughter!
sentences.cn: 恭喜你生了个女儿！

sentences.en: Doctors say the disease is probably inherited but not detectable at birth.
sentences.cn: 医生说该疾病可能是遗传而来，但在出生时无法查出。

sentences.en: He only weighed 2 kilos at birth .
sentences.cn: 他出生时体重只有两公斤。

sentences.en: He only weighed 2 kilos at birth.
sentences.cn: 他出生时体重只有两公斤。

sentences.en: Henry has been blind from birth .
sentences.cn: 亨利先天失明。

sentences.en: Henry has been blind from birth.
sentences.cn: 亨利先天失明。

sentences.en: her mother had died giving birth.
sentences.cn: 她母亲分娩时死去。

sentences.en: His was not a political career predestined from birth.
sentences.cn: 他并非生来就注定要从政的。

sentences.en: I had obtained the authentic details about the birth of the organization.
sentences.cn: 我已经掌握了有关该组织诞生的可靠的详细资料。

sentences.en: I haemorrhaged badly after the birth of all three of my sons.
sentences.cn: 生我3个儿子时，我每次都出现产后大出血。

sentences.en: It was the birth of his grandchildren which gave him greatest pleasure.
sentences.cn: 孙子孙女的出生给他带来了极大的快乐。

sentences.en: More and more women are choosing to have home births .
sentences.cn: 越来越多的女性选择在家分娩。

sentences.en: More and more women are choosing to have home births.
sentences.cn: 越来越多的女性选择在家分娩。

sentences.en: More rarely, the tubes have been malformed from birth.
sentences.cn: 这些管状器官先天畸形的现象更加少见。

sentences.en: Patsy was celebrating last night after giving birth to twins.
sentences.cn: 帕齐生下一对双胞胎，昨天晚上在庆祝。

sentences.en: Poverty and illiteracy go together with high birth rates.
sentences.cn: 贫困、文盲与高出生率密切相关。

sentences.en: she &B{gave birth to} a son.
sentences.cn: 她生了一个儿子。

sentences.en: She concealed her pregnancy right up to the moment of birth.
sentences.cn: 她隐瞒了自己怀孕的事，直到孩子出世。

sentences.en: She gave birth to Annabel just after her seventeenth birthday.
sentences.cn: 她17岁生日刚过便生下了安娜贝尔。

sentences.en: Smoking in pregnancy has been linked to premature birth .
sentences.cn: 孕期吸烟已被认为与早产有关联。

sentences.en: Smoking in pregnancy has been linked to premature birth.
sentences.cn: 孕期吸烟已被认为与早产有关联。

sentences.en: the association between birth weight and blood pressure
sentences.cn: 出生体重和血压的关系

sentences.en: the birth of a nation
sentences.cn: 一个国家的诞生

sentences.en: The drug was found to cause serious birth defects .
sentences.cn: 这种药被发现可造成严重的先天缺陷。

sentences.en: The drug was found to cause serious birth defects.
sentences.cn: 这种药被发现可造成严重的先天缺陷。

sentences.en: The exact place of birth is not recorded.
sentences.cn: 确切的出生地没有记录。

sentences.en: The pill is the most efficient method of birth control.
sentences.cn: 服用避孕药是最有效的避孕方法。

sentences.en: The Prince's destiny was predetermined from the moment of his birth.
sentences.cn: 从出生的那一刻起，王子的命运就已经被预先决定了。

sentences.en: The registration form showed his date of birth as August 2, 1979.
sentences.cn: 登记表显示他的出生日期是1979年8月2号。

sentences.en: They believe that the position of the planets at the time of birth determines the fate of the individual.
sentences.cn: 他们相信，出生时的星象决定了一个人的命运。

sentences.en: Three months before birth babies are already responsive to sound.
sentences.cn: 在出生前3个月，胎儿就已经对声音有反应了。

sentences.en: What’s your date of birth ?
sentences.cn: 你的出生日期是哪一天？

words.tran_cn: 生育的；生育用的；分娩用的

phrases.tran_cn: n. [宗]童贞女之子；[动]单性生殖

trans.tran_cn: 出生，分娩，诞生，出现，出身
trans.tran_en: the time when a baby comes out of its mother’s body
